TopicTitle: How do I make a Module manager plugin?

Articles.Content: How do I make a module manager plugin?

1. Install a version of ModuleManager compatible with your version of KSP
  2. Create a file with a .cfg extension somewhere under your GameData directory
  3. Fill the file with content according to:
    https://github.com/sarbian/ModuleManager/wiki/Module-Manager-Handbook
